backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing two UI behaviors linked to App.tsx, including happiest puppy on acceptance and looping sad puppies on NO clicks.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Mapped summaries of key frontend files including App.tsx behavior, global styles, and Tailwind config.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH theme tokens, dark mode variants, and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entrypoint mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component implementing Valentine interaction logic, puppy image switching, confetti, gradient cycling, and moving NO button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and refreshing a backend actor based on Internet Identity changes using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, logout, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind and custom CSS with Quicksand font, OKLCH theme variables, animations, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entrypoint setting up QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending colors, typography, shadows, animations, and registering plugins for a themed UI.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s state for a responsive Valentine-themed single-page app, including features, required images, and UI behaviors. Lists implemented features such as screen transitions, button logic, background changes, and puppy image updates.
